Key Match Events: The Dodgers came back twice late to win Game 1
The Yankees pushed the Dodgers to the final out of Saturday night's Game 2
Aaron Judge went 0-for-4 with three more strikeouts
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees' plan in the offseason was Yama-Soto, but after the Yankees landed Juan Soto in a trade, Yamamoto decided he preferred teaming with Ohtani
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Rizzo said, 'The Dodgers have played really well and you can't take anything away from them. But the look in everyone's eyes in here makes me feel this is far from over'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shohei Ohtani sustained what the team called a subluxation of his left shoulder when he jammed his hand into the ground while being caught stealing in the seventh inning
